Those were covered only by the tiniest of leaf-shaped adhesives on her breasts. As she turned to face them again, they could see clearly that her womanhood was neatly covered by the same vine that hid her butt from public eyes, creeping up over her neatly-shaved womanly slit. The actress' costume did everything it could to cover up her naughty parts, but left absolutely little of her beautiful figure to the imagination.

A hushed gasp fell over the crowd, as did many a whoop, whistle and holler. Even the five friends were surprised.

"Oh my!" said Hinata, putting a hand to her lips, which did much to hide the grin that was splitting her face.

"Is this for real?" said Tenten incredulously.

"Wow," said Ninata. This play just got a whole lot more interesting all of a sudden.

"Wonder where I can get something like that?" whispered Ino.

Sakura, meanwhile could only stare in stunned silence. She knew the story well enough, but this was not the kind of performance she had been expecting. Ninata thought she heard the pinkette say something to them, but she couldn't be bothered to listen. Whatever Sakura had to say could wait. There was a hot 90% naked chick onstage!

Uzume's dance grew more provocative. Her swaying sped up and she shifted her pose. Sometimes, she would stand up straight, arch herself backward, and put her hands behind her head, jutting her cute breasts out and jiggling them before everyone's eyes. Other times, she would bend forward, slide her hands onto her knees and wiggle her behind. She was not shy about showing off, and nearly everything about her was on display. Her boobs as they appeared from the front and to the side, the way her slim stomach curved inward ever so slightly to show off her cute belly button, how round and spherical her buttocks were and how silky-smooth they had to have been to the touch, and especially how graceful and limber she appeared through her dancing. Ninata burned all her features to memory. And without realizing it, she had activated her Byakugan, just so that she could get a better look at Uzume...and see what she looked like without the tantalizing costume in the way.

A warm hand gripped her own, and through her sphere of vision, Ninata saw that Hinata was doing the same thing, leering at the dancing beauty with the full power of the Hyuga clan's pride and joy. And if she was anything like Ninata, which she very nearly was, she was likely feeling very warm down there too.

Dang. I was trying to avoid something like that from happening, she huffed, knowing she was beginning to feel the first tingling pangs of moisture in her lower lips. Why can't we wear anything under these things anyway?

At last, the goddess Amaterasu came out of her cave, looking confused and curious over what was causing the commotion outside. Her befuddlement gave way to shock and surprise when she saw the nearly naked young beauty dancing on an overturned washtub.

"What on Earth is happening out here?" she said, absolutely dazzled.

Uzume shot her a brief glance before throwing her head back in a dismissive laugh, her voice carrying a happy lilt. "What is happening out here, you say? Why, we are merely celebrating the arrival of our new goddess!"

"What new goddess?" Amaterasu asked, her face and voice betraying a sense of offense at that notion.

"Why, this one!" said Uzume. And in a single flourishing spin, she dove off the washtub, spreading her legs wide to give her captive audience an even more teasing glimpse of the treasure she held between them, prompting even hoots and hollers from around the stage, and presented to the sun goddess a decorative bronze mirror held by two stagehands.

Amaterasu gazed at her reflection, and let out a theatrical gasp at the sight before her. "Long had it been since she had seen her reflection," the narrator explained. "Long had it been since the sun goddess beheld her own glory."

"Who are you?" Amaterasu asked, cautiously approaching the mirror. "Do you seek to steal my domain?" Step by step she drew closer to her reflection. Reaching a hand forward, she dared to touch the woman before her, only to be met by cold glass. And that was when realization sunk in.

"We are here to welcome our new goddess," said Uzume, embracing Amaterasu from behind, pressing her almost nude form into the goddess' kimono. Ninata and Hinata exchanged a knowing glance. This scene was looking oddly familiar for them. "That is...if she will accept it," she added, her voice dipping to a husky whisper that was still loud enough for everyone to hear.

"She will," said Amaterasu. "She will."

And so the play wrapped up. Emboldened by her marvelous radiance, Amaterasu resumed her duties as the goddess of the sun, brighter and stronger than she ever had been before. The actress and her fellow thespians joined her on the stage alongside the musicians, who all stood up, and gave a bow to everyone in the audience.

"The Tenraku Players thank you for your patronage," said the actress who played Amaterasu, "and we wish you all a festive new year!" And amidst many cheers and applause, she embraced the actress who played Ame-no-Uzume, who was wearing naught but her skin and a few strategically-placed plant-like adhesives, and gave her a deep kiss on the lips.

=====

"Well...I wasn't expecting to see anything like that," said Tenten as she and the other girls floated away from the stage to continue touring the sites of the festival.

"Well, I liked it," said Ino. "Especially that dance. If they had more things like that at the shrines, I just might become a more spiritual person!"

"Me too!" said Ninata. If she had still been a boy, she likely would have been decked by at least one of the girls present for displaying such pervy thoughts. But instead, she was met with a round of giggles from all of her girlfriends. Coming out of her sweet little mouth, they all thought it was funny. Though she liked to at least think that all of them agreed that the world would be a better place if it had more naked or nearly naked women in it. But that was just another fantasy.

Sakura, however, was oddly silent. "Is something the matter, Sakura-chan?" said Hinata in a worried tone.

"Uh...no, it's nothing," said the pinkette. "It's just...the play, it took a whole lot of liberties is all."
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.title: It's surprisingly risqué

1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.content:
At Tenten's words, it was obvious what they needed to do: hurry over to the village square and play some games. All kinds of stands and canvas lean-tos of vibrant colors were stationed there in rows, circling down to the center of Konoha in a spiral. There was a goldfish scooping game, a number of fortune tellers, some betting wheels and slots, and most prominent of all, signs that read "Absolutely no ninjutu allowed!"

"Rats, they thought of everything," muttered Ninata.

However, one particular stand stood out, or at least, it did to Tenten.

"Betcha' I can knock all those down," she said.

Four pairs of eyes followed where her hand pointed, and one of them crinkled in amusement. There wasn't anything special about it; it was a target-throwing game, which naturally would be the kind of thing that would appeal to Tenten. That wasn't what caught Ninata's interest though: it was the targets themselves, all of which were identical-looking dolls that looked very familiar. Sure, they were plush, chibified and button-eyed, but she recognized that red sleeveless jacket and immense white mane. Looks like someone besides me and Obachan has a bone to pick with Ero-Sennin.

"You're on!" she said, rubbing her hands together with anticipation. "In fact, I wager that I can knock 'em all down before you!"

=====

Ninata could not knock them all down. Even with her superior Hyuga vision, the Jiraiya dolls were too fast for her, capable of dodging her throws with as much nimble grace as the mechanical conveyors that slid them back and forth were capable of giving them. She could almost hear them mocking her sad performance in the old pervert's voice, saying how she had absolutely no talent at all. But they did compliment her on having a lovely rack and a nice butt.

"Screw you, Ero-Sennin," she muttered when her last ball disappeared into the void that was the back of the lean-to.

Tenten fared much better. The weapon specialist's aim was deadly accurate. Every time a ball left her hand, a chibi Jiraiya was sent screaming into the void! Or at least Ninata liked to imagine they were, especially considering how Tenten was currently wearing her steel face of determination and looked like she was throwing to kill. It looked so out of place when juxtaposed against her elegant doll-like appearance. Kind of hot too.

Unfortunately, there seemed to be one doll that proved to be very evasive. It moved much faster than the rest, and flipped out of view more erratically. Even Tenten's skilled marksmanship was no match for it. Her previously perfect streak of scoring nothing but hits came to an end when it was the last doll standing, for all three of her throws sailed harmlessly past its brilliant white mane.

The second she lost her last ball, Tenten immediately slammed another bundle of ryou down on the counter, not giving the other girls a chance to try their luck. Not that any of them would have wanted to; if looks had destructive capability, all those Jiraiya dolls would have burst into flame, the tent would have caught on fire, the game's attendant would have been rolling on the ground screaming in agony as he burned to death, and everyone present would have grown a few shades tanner. Even Sakura, who was the absolute scariest girl Ninata had ever known, was stepping away from Tenten.

Unfortunately, Tenten's second attempt fared as well as her last one. Her first miss sailed by the final Jiraiya doll by a mile. Her second whiffed right over its hair. The third only just barely managed to graze its side. It was a hit, but not one that was hard enough to qualify as a knockdown.

Tenten was not pleased. "DAH, FRICKEN GERDFRAGGIN DERH BER!" she roared. At least, that's what it sounded like to Ninata's ears. The former boy had no idea what language the brunette was speaking, but she assumed it had to be some litany of curses. Tenten was too pissed to stand the sight of the game regardless, as she spun on her heel and stormed off.

"Tenten-san, what's wrong?" said Hinata as she ran after her.

"Yeah, what gives?" said Ino. "It's just a game."

"You didn't even claim your prizes," said Sakura. "Not that anything up there looked all that good."

"The prizes may not have been interesting," said Ninata, "but I wouldn't have minded negotiating for one of those Ero-I mean, Jiraiya dolls. Personal reasons." They looked like the kind of things you would poke with needles to cause endless torment to a person that drew your ire, and nothing would have delighted the boy-turned-girl more than the opportunity to aggravate the old man from a remote distance.

"I know," groused Tenten as she kicked some dust in the street. "I don't really care about winning some dumb bean-stuffed toad or whatever he had to offer. But it's the principle of the thing! I couldn't hit that last stupid target! And I don't have the money to spend on more games."

As the girls tried to cheer her up, Hinata took a moment to discretely activate her Byakugan. Ninata raised an eyebrow at her. "What are you doing?"

"Looking at the game," said the blunette as her brow furrowed with thought at what she was seeing. "Tenten-san, you wouldn't have been able to knock that doll off no matter how good your aim was."

"What do you mean?" said the brunette.

"It's rigged. The doll is connected to a magnet."

"That son of a bitch!" growled Sakura, punching a fist into her palm. "We can't let him get away with that. How many kids could he be scamming today?"

"Let's call shenanigans!" cheered Ninata. "Let's all grab a broom and trash the place!"

"Whoa, whoa, I like random destruction as much as the next girl," said Ino, "but do we really need to resort to that so soon? It's not even noon yet."

An impish smile began to spread across Hinata's face. "I have a better idea."

=====

With no customers to attend to, Goro was free to start counting up his earnings for the day. They weren't bad so far. That group of five gave him a nice stack of cash, though if that raven-head didn't have such a short fuse, he might have made even more off them. Then again, maybe it was for the best; she was clearly an expert thrower. Given enough tries, she might have actually hit the last target and found out his dirty little secret.

He looked up to see them approaching his stand once more, the brunette in the lead. "One more game, please," she said stoically, laying some bills down on the table.

He nodded, maintaining his poker face to keep the greedy grin from seeping in and giving the game away. "All right, then. Good luck!"

Goro stepped aside as the teen did her thing, hurling each ball with expert precision at his targets. As usual, she was accurate and didn't miss. However, the rest of her companions didn't seem interested in her performance. The blonde and pinkette moved to one side to chat about teenage girl stuff, while the blunettes, who were clearly twin sisters, sidled to the other end. The one in the orange kimono stood in the front, and she looked a little nervous.

"Eep!"

At her frightened squeak, Goro realized why. Her sister had loosened up her obi and pulled the folds of the garment away, exposing an ample amount of her chest to the world. Goro's eyes nearly bugged out. The girl was so young, so small, and so fair-skinned...but she sported a very impressive bust! It had been so cleverly hidden beneath the fabric of her kimono, but now that it was loose, it was all she could do to keep the ivory orbs from bouncing out.

What a cutie!

Briefly, he wondered what color the girl's nipples were, but before he could catch so much of a glimpse of areole, the hands of her sister suddenly glomped the orbs and gave them a tender squeeze. The girl squealed again as her sweet feminine flesh bulged tantalizingly between her tormentor's fingers. "Mmmm, you feel so good," the young seductress said, whispering into her sister's ear.

"Hi-Hinata-chan!" the nearly topless girl protested. "Is it...really a good idea to do this here?"

Rather than answer her, the girl, Hinata, merely took a deep breath to inhale her sister's perfume, and brought her lips down upon her neck. The more demure twin gasped half in fright and half in pleasure as Hinata began to lightly suckle on her sensitive flesh while she continued to gently massage her boobs, rolling, squeezing and molding them in her hands like clay.

This...this wasn't right. Goro shouldn't be looking at this. These girls were sisters, and they were broadcasting their incestuous relationship to everyone in broad daylight! What was wrong with them? But he couldn't look away. They were both just so gorgeous. And the fact that they were sisters, twins even, just made their display all the more enticing. The attendant could already feel a warm trickle of blood on his lip and a slight taste of salt on his tongue.

"Oh darn," came the deadpan voice of the brunette. "Lost again."

"Ohhh, that's too bad," said Hinata in a husky tone as she pulled away from her sister's neck with a pout. "Come on then, let's go."

She let go of her sister's chest, and for an instant, before she desperately got her clothes back on, Goro saw her tits. They were pert, hard, and toned a lovely shade of pink, just the way he liked them. Flustered and red in the face, the girl darted out of sight. Such a shame; he really would have liked to see more of her.

"Er, um, come back anytime, ladies," he said when it was clear they were done with him. Realizing his nose was still bleeding, Gorou, turned around to get it properly cleaned up...only to freeze in horror at the sight that lay before him.

His targets...they were all gone!
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.title: They go to play some games

1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.content:
"Ino-pig, slow down! You'll drop them at this rate!"

"Don't lecture me! If you stuffed a few into your kimono like I suggested, they wouldn't be stacked so high that your billboard-brow would keep knocking them off. You know as well as I do that you've got plenty of storage space in there."

"Oh, screw you and the boar you rode in on!"

Ino and Sakura were making their way to the designated meeting place, ducking through alleyways and hopping over rooftops to stay out of sight. It wasn't easy, not with the busy streets or the fat stack of Jiraiya dolls they were both carrying, but it was imperative. If anyone saw them with their stolen merchandise, there'd be a lot of questions, and Ino had the distinct impression no one would believe they fell off the back of a wagon.

Ino felt her feet land on another rooftop, and with a heaving sigh, dumped the dolls where she stood. "Alright, here's the place we agreed to meet at. You can drop them now, Billboard-Brow."

Sakura did just that. "Phew! What a hassle. Just what's gotten into Hinata's head anyway? I never would've imagined that she'd ever have the guts to pull this kind of stunt."

"Worked pretty well though," said Ino with a grin. "We pulled it off without a hitch. Tenten gives us an excuse to approach, Hinata and Ninata divert the guy's attention, and while he's drooling over them, we rob him blind! And admit it: you enjoyed it."

"Heh, yeah. I did. It was pretty fun," said Sakura. "But don't you think Hinata might have overdone it a little? I thought they were just going to make out, but she nearly stripped Ninata in public!"

"Aw, I liked it. Ninata looks so cute when she's embarrassed." And to be honest, Ino kind of wished it went further than it did.

"Yeah, I'll admit, she's cute when she gets like that. But she's such a sucker. She'll do anything if Hinata flutters her eyelashes enough. And sometimes, seeing the way they act kinda' makes me want to hurl."

Ino huffed. "Oh come off it, you prude! Leave them be. They're happy, which is more than you and I could say about ourselves and–"

She was stopped cold in her tracks when out of nowhere, Sakura's face twisted into a furious scowl. "Don't even think about finishing that sentence."

Ino nearly fell where she stood. What the heck brought that on? "Sakura? What...?"

"I know what you're going to say," growled the pinkette as she turned around and plopped down on the shingles. "I know you're going to go on about how we both wasted years of our lives on Sasuke, and that's why we're both single and miserable now. I don't want to hear it! And I don't want to hear how much you want him dead now!"

Since his desertion and defection, Sasuke had become an even greater point of contention for the two girls. Sakura believed he could be redeemed. Ino knew he could not. And in the week following that disastrous mission, they fought each other more viciously than ever before because of that one disagreement. It only ended after their latest tussle where, exhausted from expending so much energy, they just started laughing at the futility of it all. They were no longer competing for his affection, and yet he was still keeping them at each other's throats. In a way, it made the blonde hate him even more. But she and Sakura finally decided enough was enough. They agreed that they would start getting along from that point on, to work together, and maybe be nice to one another like they used to be before he ever entered the picture. But the two knew they would never budge on that issue, so they came to an agreement: they would never, ever, ever mention or even allude to the Uchiha in the other's presence. As long as they kept silent about him, they would get along.

And that's how things were. The subject of Sasuke never again came up between Ino and Sakura, and things were at last good between them. It was like they were almost kids again, sitting carefree in the fields and making flower wreathes for each other.

Ino opened her mouth to say something, but whatever thought she had died on her tongue. The air was thick with silent tension. If she uttered the wrong word, whispered the wrong syllable, then everything she and Sakura had built up over the past few months would come crashing down. And Ino didn't want that to happen. She didn't want this rift to reopen. She didn't want to lose another friend. She didn't want Sasuke to ruin her life any more than he already had.

Finally, Sakura let out a defeated sigh, her head dropping as if the air had gone out of it. "I'm sorry," she said, wiping her eyes at some tears that were likely streaming from her eyes. "I shouldn't have said that. But the thing is...you're right. Ninata just fell into Hinata's lap, she has the love of her life now, and I...don't. And seeing Hinata and Ninata be all romantic with each other, however inappropriately, just reminds me of what I don't have. And what I...don't think I'll ever have. And it makes me jealous. It's like everything is perfect for her, but it won't ever be for me. And it's just...it's not fair."

"I understand," said Ino, sighing with relief that their little spat managed to end before it was able to begin. She took a seat next to her friend. "To be honest, I'm kind of jealous too. But for a different reason."

"Really? How so?" said Sakura.

Ino took a deep breath. She was about to let something out, something she hadn't quite told anyone yet. "I...it was a few months ago, but I realized that...I like girls."

Sakura jumped back in clear surprise. "Whoa, what...really? You do?"

"Yeah. I do," said Ino. "And not only that, but...I 'm really attracted to them. To Hinata and Ninata."

"I...wow," said Sakura. "So, uh, when you said you liked Hinata's little display back there, do you mean you...?"

Ino simply nodded her assent.

"I...see. Huh. I can see why that can get awkward."

"It is, believe me," said the blonde. "I have no chance to get between them, and I wouldn't want to. But I really wish Hinata would spawn another twin, one who I could have for myself. Or maybe, I dunno...if whatever happened to her would happen to me so I'd have a twin to love me too."

Sakura wrinkled her nose. "Wouldn't you find dating yourself kind of weird?"

"Maybe, but it's been working out amazingly well for Hinata. She just has this glow about her when she's around Ninata, you know?"

"Well, yeah, but it's different for them. They're...they're..."

Sakura paused, the words fading before they could leave her lips. She swore she had a solid argument in her head, but she couldn't recall what it was. And now that she was thinking about it, she realized the oddest thing of all: even though Hinata was effectively in a romantic relationship with her twin sister, the pinkette never once equated it with incest. And she couldn't for the life of her figure out why.

"Look," said Ino, "I don't expect you to get me. But there's definitely something special between those two. And whatever it is, I want in on it."

The pinkette sighed in defeat. "Alright, I understand. I get this is probably not the easiest thing for you to deal with. Or to admit."

Ino shrugged. "To be honest, I'm surprised you didn't figure it out on your own. You might be the first person I've come out of the closet to, but it's not something I've been hiding either."

"Well, now that we've gotten that out of the way, we might as well get this out then," said Sakura. "Nothing's changed between us. I have no problems with your attraction to girls, but I don't share it. So don't bother asking me out."

Ino snorted playfully. "Oh, don't you worry. I prefer my girls to have a much smaller melon on their shoulders."

Sakura smirked back at her. "Oh, you would, would you?" she responded with mock indignity. "Well, I feel sorry for any girl who has to put up with a messy pig like you!"

The friends' laughter had only just begun to die down by the time Hinata, Ninata and Tenten caught up with them.

=====

"So what do we do with all these things anyway?" said Tenten as she examined the pile of Jiraiya dolls.

"I'm claiming this one!" said Ninata as she proudly held a doll up in the air. "This is the one you couldn't hit, which means it's cursed."

"Why would you want a cursed doll?" said Ino.

"Personal reasons." Ino, Sakura and Tenten crossed their arms, clearly not satisfied with the former boy's answer. "Okay, fine. So I can turn it into an effigy and put curses on Jiraiya. Like give him hiccups or diarrhea, or make him impotent or something."
"Why?" said Sakura. "What did he do to you?"

"Because he's a peeping dirty old man is why!" said Ninata with a curt nod, as if that alone explained anything.

"Um, Ninata-chan, are you sure that's a good idea?" said Hinata. "He is Hokage-sama's friend."

"And she'd be the first in line for a chance to curse the old perv!"

Sakura massaged her forehead as if to soothe an ache in it. "Ninata, you know those things are only make-believe. With some of the ideas you come up with, I swear you're really just Naruto masquerading in a Hinata-shaped henge."

At that, Ninata began to cough violently, prompting a distressed Hinata to rush to her side.

"Are you okay?" said Ino.

"I'm...I'm fine," sputtered Ninata. "Just...some saliva went down the wrong chute is all."
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.title: Ino's Confession

choices: Ninata decides to do just that!
Uh, maybe they should go get lunch instead.
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.content:
"That was a fun little trick you pulled," said Ino as she helped the Hyuga stash the stolen Jiraiya dolls. "And real clever too."

"Thank you, Ino-san."

"There's just one thing I'd like to...no, forget I said anything."

"What is it?" said Hinata with a quizzical tilt of her head.

"Ohhh, I know this might sound weird, but," Ino trailed off, not really knowing if it would be a good idea to finish her question.

"You can tell me anything, Ino-san," said Hinata in that same gentle tone she always spoke in.

Ino sighed. "Okay...the next time you do anything like that...would it be okay if I got to fondle Ninata for a bit too?"

Ino expected a lot of things from the blunette. A slap to the face, a gasp of horror, or a silent glare for even suggesting she lay a hand on her girlfriend. And honestly, Ino wouldn't have blamed her if she did. But she was not prepared at all for the answer she was given.

A mystifying smile curved its way up Hinata's face. "I don't know if we'll get a chance to do anything like that again today," the Hyuga said in an equally cryptic voice. "But tonight, if you're willing to come to our home, we can see where this goes."

=====

"Really? You're going to try again? How much money are you going to put into that thing?"

"I'm telling you, Tenten, there's a trick to this. I've done it before, and I made a nice bundle in the process."

While they waited for Ino and Hinata to catch up to them, the girls were currently busying themselves with a giant slot machine, one that seemed to be designed to look as if it was made out of bamboo. Or at least Sakura was busying herself with it. Tenten stood to the side, looking bored with her arms crossed, and Ninata was simply looking on with amusement at her former teammate's blundering.

Who woulda' thought Sakura-chan would develop a gambling problem? she silently snickered. Good thing Granny didn't take her as a student, or else they'd both drive the village to bankruptcy. She had been learning a lot about the pinkette since she took on Hinata's form. To Team 7, Sakura always acted like she was above the foibles and eccentricities of her teammates, but looking at how she acted around her own sex, it was clear she was as above them as a hole in the ground.

"It's all luck," huffed Tenten. "There's no rhyme or reason to what will show up on those wheels. Give it up."

"You're wrong. There is a method here," said Sakura. "If you pull the level at the right moment, once you see everything line up just right for one millisecond, you can score a win. Just...like...THIS!"

Ding-ding-ding! The machine chimed happily as three chibi anime girl faces lined up on the slots and a nice shiny pile of chips began to pour out. Ninata's eyebrows just about grew wings, and she was certain Tenten's had as well.

"HELL YEAH!" cheered Sakura as she pumped a fist triumphantly in the air. Grinning smugly at the brunette, she added. "So what do you think about THAT, huh?"

"Congratulations, Sakura-chan," said Ninata with a nod of approval.

Tenten rolled her eyes. "Okay, fine, maybe there is a trick to it," she said, though she still sounded doubtful. "But how did you figure it out?"

"It was a couple months ago. Me and my team went to a gambling town," said the girl in the red kimono as she gathered up her winnings. "I was posing as a civilian and was playing around with one of these things in a casino, just to blend in, when I caught the eye of a handsome gentleman who decided he would explain to the pretty lady just what she needed to do to win. Let's just say that thanks to his helpful tips, I returned home with more than twice what the mission would have paid me."

"You mean they actually let you in a place like that, despite how..." Tenten paused, realizing she had to weigh her words carefully. She had already seen what happened to anyone who alluded to the pinkette's not-so-sizeable chest. For that, Ninata was thankful her kimono hid her and Hinata's breasts. Much as she loved the big creamy fun bags they were both gifted with, she didn't want her pink-haired friend to feel inadequate around them.

"...How young you look?" said Tenten, finishing her question as diplomatically as possible. "And don't you think it's creepy that some older guy would hit on you like that?"

"It was fine," said Sakura. "I used a rather elaborate transformation technique to fool him and everyone into thinking I was older than I really am. In fact, don't you two say anything about this to anyone, but I kind of got the idea for it from Naruto."

"Oh?" said Ninata with a quirked eyebrow. "How so?"

"My old teammate was a little perv, and he developed a technique where he would turn himself into a naked girl. Made guys' heads turn seconds before they passed out. I don't know the full story of where he got it from, but he apparently made up the form based on what he'd seen ogling women. I smacked him every time he considered using it, but...it at least gave me a good idea on how to make me look like a mature lady that could capture guys' attention."

"Wow," said Ninata with a wide grin. "This Naruto had to be devilishly cunning and handsome to develop such a technique!"

"He...had his moments," said Sakura, her eyes shifting to the side with uncertainty. "But any guy who acts like that is doomed to die a virgin."

Ninata let out an unamused snort. Big words coming from a virgin. If only you knew what 'Naruto' has been getting into, Sakura-chan.

"Well, I guess you at least you have a method to this madness," said Tenten. "Most people who play around with these things don't. I just don't have any respect for the kinds of people who throw all their money away gambling."

"Hey, I think I see the Hokage over there," said Ninata with a giggle.

"HOKAGE? WHERE?!" Tenten exclaimed as numerous 8x11 glossy photos of Tsunade materialized in her hands.

Ninata and Sakura sweatdropped. Tenten always had a serious hero worship of Tsunade, but it was getting more and more manic as of late. She seemed to be amassing a collection of pictures and she was making a habit of carrying them with her at all times.

"Oh, uh, you just missed her."

Tenten's head slumped despondently. "Damn. I was really hoping to get her autograph. You and Hinata are so lucky; you get to see her just about every week!"

"It's not as exciting as you think," said Ninata. "It's like getting a checkup from any other doctor. She just pokes and prods us, sticks us with needles, hooks us up to machines and asks all sorts of...personal questions." About out sex life.

"I don't care!" said the brunette. "I'd kill for the chance to be touched by the Hokage. If she ran her hands all over my body, I'd never bathe again!"

Wow...she's really got a thing for the old woman. I think Tenten really needs to get herself a girlfriend. Or maybe Hinata-chan and I could help her with...oh no, don't think like that, Ninata-chan! Bad Ninata-chan!

"Hinata! Ino!" cried a gleeful Sakura, who was clearly getting uncomfortable with the turn this conversation had taken and was happy to seize any opportunity to change it. "It's so good to see you again!"

"Did we miss anything?" said Ino as she and the blunette approached the trio with a visible skip to her step.

"I just won a little bit of money," said the pinkette.

"I missed the Hokage," sulked Tenten, who was pouting like a child who didn't get her ice cream..

"Heeeey, nice haul, Sakura! And, uh, sorry to hear that, Tenten," said the blonde.

"Tenten-san, if you want the Hokage's autograph so much, Ninata and I could just get one from her the next time we see her."

"But I want her to sign it for me!" said the black-haired girl with a pout. "I want to be there when she does it."

"Oh, don't worry about Hokage-sama, Tenten-san" said Hinata gently. "After all," she added in a sultry whisper, stepping closer until her lips were nearly touching the older girl's ear, "you've got me."

Tenten turned red as a tomato.

=====

The next few hours breezed by without incident. The girls spent that time exploring the village square and sampling the many diversions it had to offer. Oftentimes, they would embark on little competitions with each other to see who was the best at which games. To nobody's surprise, Tenten dominated anything that involved throwing things. Hinata, with her gentle grace, proved to be the most adept with the goldfish scoop. However, Ino surprised everyone when she soundly beat them all at the high striker game.

Ninata had to know her secret. "What kind of jutsu were you doing, and how did they not catch you?"

"You wound me, Ninata-chan!" Ino huffed in mock indignity. "There's no jutsu involved. I've just been doing a lot of strength training is all. Here, feel my muscles!" At this, she flexed her bicep and offered it to the transformed Hyuga.

Ninata obliged her. Wrapped up in the wide sleeve, it was impossible to see the tone Ino had developed, but the hard muscle rippling underneath was undeniable.. "Wow," she whispered, very impressed. The blonde had always been a real skinny girl back at the academy, but if her arm was anything to go by, she was on her way to becoming a full-on amazon.

"I'm surprised you didn't notice. With your eyes, you can see what I look like under my clothes whenever you like!"
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.title: Rendezvous

1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.content:
Ninata blushed. "I-I wouldn't do...that wouldn't be..."

"Aw, no need to be bashful, Ninata-chan," said Ino, pinching her cheek playfully. "If you want to see me naked, you totally can. I don't mind! I've already seen you naked, so it's only fair."

"Hey, is anyone else hungry?" said Ninata, clapping her hands together in an effort to change the subject.

"Now that you mention it," said Sakura, "I'm feeling peckish too. How about we all get lunch, guys? My treat!"

=====

"You...want to eat here?" said Ino incredulously.

"Yes, this is where I want to eat," said Sakura. "Icharaku's!"

Ninata grinned nodded with silent approval. Icharaku's was the greatest restaurant in the world, and as far as she was concerned, Konoha's greatest resource. If anyone outside the Land of Fire knew about the succulent taste of its noodles or the masterful talent of Master Teuchi, Konoha would undoubtedly be locked in a never-ending war against the entire world. So of course Sakura would want to eat there!

"But weren't you always complaining about how Naruto would drag your team over here every chance he had?" said Ino. "And how absolutely sick you were of ramen, never wanted to see another bowl of the stuff again, and prayed every night for a meteor to fall down and incinerate–"

"Shut up, you pig!" cried Sakura, clamping a hand on the blonde's mouth. "What are you trying to do, make everyone think I'm a heartless bitch? I was just exagger–uh, Ninata, are you crying?"

She wasn't yet, but she was on the verge. Ninata could only stare with misty eyes at the bubblegum-haired girl who over the course of five seconds shattered her heart into a million little pieces. How could Sakura say such horrible things? How could she possibly hate ramen and Icharaku's so much that she'd wish ill upon them? Was everything Ninata thought she knew about Sakura a lie? Could she really call her a friend anymore? Looking at her now, it was like...she was a complete stranger. She knew nothing about this girl!

A tear rolled down her cheek. Everything's different. Nothing with Sakura-chan is going to be the same anymore. I don't know if I could possibly...oooh, is that chashu pork?

The sweet aroma of soy sauce mixed with the spicy iridescent scent of ginger and just enough garlic to give it a kick was unmistakable, as was the rich salty smell of pig belly turning white in the heat. It was enough to make a girl wet...in her mouth of course. Ninata licked her lips hungrily, her depression vanishing in an instant. "No, I'm fine," she said, flicking her tear away disinterestedly. "Just caught a whiff of some onions is all."

Eat now, angst later!

"Well...if you say so," said Sakura.

The five girls took their seats and their orders from one of the two girls who were currently manning the restaurant. Teuchi and Ayame were nowhere to be seen, but that wasn't unusual. In keeping up with the increased business the holidays brought in, the old man would usually sequester himself in the back of the shop where he could work undisturbed, while the temporary help he hired for the day would handle the customers. Meanwhile, his daughter was probably out and about enjoying the celebrations, as he often let her take holidays off.

"Okay, I admit it," said Sakura, picking up from where she left off in her conversation with Ino. "I did get sick of this place. But now that I don't get dragged here so often anymore...I actually kind of miss it. I miss coming here, hanging with my old team. I miss being trained by Kakashi, even if he was a pretty lousy teacher. And I miss Naruto. So being here...just kind of reminds me of those days."

"Here are your orders," said a woman as she served each girl their hearty bowls of ramen.

Sakura took a deep breath of the new scents in the air and stole a glance over at Ninata's bowl of miso chashu pork ramen, which was right next to hers. "Especially that. Of all the ramen in the world, I think that was his favorite."

Ninata split her chopsticks up, trying her damnedest not to look the pinkette in the eye. "You...don't say?"

"I do," Sakura sighed wistfully, breathing the scent in again. "Ahhh...it's just like the dunce is sitting here right now."

Ninata shifted uncomfortably in her seat. This was not a line of conversation she wanted to pursue or listen to. And from the corner of her vision, she could see Hinata didn't like it either.

"I got to go to the bathroom," she said, quickly slurping up some noodles. "Guard my ramen, okay Hinata-chan?"

"Of course, Ninata-chan," her twin said with a warm smile. They exchanged a kiss and the boy-turned-girl ambled off for parts unknown.

She didn't really need to use the restroom. She just needed some time to herself for a moment. If she stayed near the girls for too long while they got sentimental about her past self, she didn't know what would happen. Since turning into Hinata and spending so much time with the normally reserved girl, Ninata had been getting a lot better about lengthening the distance between her brain and her mouth, but she still didn't trust that oversized oral cavity with her secrets. If Sakura kept on bemoaning about how much she missed Naruto, then it was only a matter of time before Ninata blurted out something she'd regret.

Ninata sighed. She hated having to keep this transformation of hers a secret. She wished she could just tell everyone that she was Naruto and get on with her life already. She wanted to say the whole story about Hinata's yin and yang chakra splitting up was a load of BS, that she had no idea how she transformed, no idea how she could change back, but was happy with it regardless. But she couldn't, not yet. It wasn't safe for her if so many people knew, and it wouldn't be safe for them either. So for the good of everyone, she had to stay quiet, no matter how much it frustrated her. Or hurt Sakura.

Suddenly, a chill ran up Ninata's spine. Someone was watching her. Giving a cursory glance all around, the former boy found herself looking directly into the wide lavender eyes of a fellow Hyuga across the street. It was a little girl around Konohamaru's age, possibly younger, with chocolate-brown hair cut into a bob, a plain grey kimono, and a stick of dango in her hand. Ninata would say she appeared pretty cute all things considered...if it didn't look like her eyes were boring deep into her soul.

"Um...hello," said Ninata with a slight wave of her hand. The girl didn't grace her with a response. She just continued to stand there, staring at Ninata with an unreadable expression. Her gaze did not shift even as people passed by between them. "Is there something on my face?" the former boy asked as she stepped closer to the girl.

"You're not Hinata," said the young Hyuga.

Ninata blinked. That was not the answer she was expecting. "I...never said that I was."

"Who are you? And why do you look like Hinata?"

"I'm Ninata. And I'm...her clone, you could say."

"Clone?" said the girl, taking a bite out of her dango.

"Yeah. Her Yin chakra split from her Yang chakra, and formed...me."

The little girl didn't look convinced. "Your chakra looks normal to me."

"Well that's what happened!" said Ninata, who was really starting to feel the urge to punt the brat across the village. "Ask the Hokage herself if you're so curious. And who the hell are you to start questioning who I am?"

"I'm Hanabi," said the girl. "Hinata's sister."

Oh. Ohhhhh! So this was her girlfriend's little sister. Hinata mentioned her, but never really talked about her much. This was the first time Ninata ever saw her. "Well then, a pleasure to meet you, Hanabi," she said with as much artificial pep as she could force between her teeth.

Hanabi responded by just taking another bite from her dango stick, eating what remained of the dough ball. This experience was clearly not very pleasurable to her either.

Ninata groaned with annoyance. Was this going to go anywhere, or did this kid get her kicks out of wasting other people's time? "Do you have something you want to tell me?" she said, crossing her arms in a way she hoped would make her look authoritative despite her small delicate frame. "Or to your other sister, Hinata?"

And suddenly the girl's expression changed. Her eyes shifted away from Ninata's, her head turned to the side, her mouth curved downward into a frown, and she looked...almost sad. "No," she answered in what could only be called a quiet mumble.

"Okay then. See you," said Ninata, thankful that this awkward encounter was finally reaching its end.

"Wait!" Hanabi called out just as Ninata started to walk away. The former boy turned to give her a questioning look. The little girl shifted uncomfortable on her feet, staring off to the side to avoid her "older sister's" gaze and actually acting like her age for once. After a moment of awkward silence, Hanabi finally shut her eyes and extended her hand out, offering the last couple balls of dango she had left.

"You...want me to take this?" Ninata asked.

Hanabi gave her a very small nod, so slight that Ninata had a hard time telling she even moved at all. It honestly reminded her of Hinata when she tried to offer Ninata medicine after her duel with Kiba back in the Chuunin exams. Guess I'm starting to see the family resemblance.

"Well...alright. Thank you, I guess."

Hanabi merely nodded again as Ninata plucked the stick from her hand. Then without another word of acknowledgment, she scurried away, disappearing into the crowd of festival goers.

"What was that about?" Ninata mumbled as she took a bite of dango. "Weird kid."
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.title: Ninata Meets Her "Little Sister"

choices: See what the night has to offer
1212222211121121222121122222112212111221.content:
"...but by the time she got there, the whole place had burned down, and she no longer had a stitch of clothing to her name!"

"Mmmm-hm-hm-hm-hm!" Hinata slapped a palm on her mouth to keep the loud guffaw from escaping. She couldn't take this much longer; she had to suppress so much laughter over the past 15 minutes that it hurt. If Ino told one more story, her ailing lungs were very likely to burst into flames.

"AH-HA HA HA HA!" Ffffshhhhh! "Ahhhh! What the hell?!" Meanwhile, Sakura had just learned the hard way that she was not capable of such restraint. "Ewwww, I think noodles just sprayed out of my nose."

Naruto didn't spare Shizune a glance even as the older woman rose to try and stop her. It didn't matter right now. Only getting help from Bā-chan and returning to her male self mattered. She'd apologize to Shizune-née-chan later, she'd understand.

The redhead paused in her movements only long enough to give Hinata a quick glance and see the girl still soundly asleep, though she did try snuggling deeper into her new bosom. Ignoring the blush on her face and the odd fluttering sensation in her stomach, Naruto pushed forward into the room, only to nearly sweat-drop at seeing Bā-chan sleeping at her desk, an empty bottle of sake in hand.

"Damn it Bā-chan! Stop being a drunk and wake up!! We need help!!!" She hadn't meant to snap and yell, really she didn't. However, after waking up and finding she had not only changed genders, but bodies with some girl she hadn't known, she was having a harder time than usual showing patience. In truth, holding Hinata as she was in her arms was the only thing keeping the now red-haired beauty from throwing a near hysterical fit. Naruto had never been quite so grateful for the sleeping girl's naturally peaceful aura as she was right at this moment.

Seeing Tsunade finally begin to stir made Naruto anxious. She was so tempted to try and speed up the waking of her village leader, but she knew that could lead to her getting the drunken woman's fist. As much as she had been able to handle those sort of hits before, Naruto wasn't as confident in her new female body. It just didn't feel as sturdy as her old self. Most of all though, she didn't want to risk causing harm to Hinata. Strong as the girl might be, Naruto simply refused to do something that had such a high chance of hurting one of her most precious people.

After a moment, Naruto vaguely thought she heard a voice mutter something that sounded suspiciously like "gaki (brat)." Taking this as a sign that Tsunade had woken up, Naruto opened her mouth to speak, but was interrupted by a certain assistant walking in right behind her.

"Young lady, you can't just go barging into..." Shizune quickly trailed off at seeing Tsunade seemingly wake up. "Tsunade-sama! My apologies for disturbing you, m'lady." Tsunade simply gave a small gesture in return, effectively saying not to worry about it. Deciding that it would be best to let Tsunade deal with the oddly familiar-looking young redhead, Shizune quickly slipped out of the office, closing the doors on her way out.

Now that the distraction was out of the way, Naruto was quick to turn her pretty violet eyes back on target. "Bā-chan, we need help." Unconsciously she gently shifted Hinata around in her arms, making sure the girl was comfortable as Naruto honestly didn't want to relinquish her anytime soon. However, Tsunade had caught sight of the two just before Naruto finished speaking. Squinting, Tsunade's intoxicated gaze caught the subtle shifting of the girl in the redhead's arms. While it might have been enough for a civilian to overlook, she was the Hokage. Drunk or not, she could still pick up on subtle movements. Her drunken mind putting what she thought to be two and two together, Tsunade nodded and pulled out some papers to write out a marriage contract.

"Right, I'll get you two fixed up," she said, her tone holding no sign of drunkenness. A lesser woman might have been unable to prevent her voice from slurring, but Tsunade was not just any woman; she was one of the most powerful ninjas in the world! And one didn't become one of the most powerful ninjas in the world without learning a few ways to hide how absolutely plastered you were.

It worked too. Naruto could only sigh in relief, as it looked like Bā-chan wasn't nearly as smashed as she initially thought. The old woman was still clearly in control of her facilities and appeared to know what she was doing while she filled out the forms on her desk. While Naruto couldn't help but wonder what the Hokage needed all those papers for, she quickly dismissed it with a light shrug. This was clearly a medical procedure of sorts, and Naruto knew that paperwork went hand in hand with those for one reason or another

Tsunade finished writing with a small flourish before turning back to the red-haired girl. "Need both of your fingerprints next to your names, in blood to make it binding."

Naruto looked at the papers in confusion. Was this really all it would take to change her back? She guessed that Bā-chan was more awesome than she had given her credit for, likely having run into this little mess before. It stood to reason that she'd know exactly how to undo this then. Still, what did Hinata have to do with changing Naruto back to her boy self? It wouldn't hurt Hinata would it? She needed to ask, just to be sure. "Signing this will really fix everything? And it won't hurt Hinata?"

"Yep. When I stamp my seal, not even the Fire Daimyō himself can easily undo it. And no, she's safe, just need some blood and her fingerprint." Tsunade could feel herself slipping. She needed to finish this before she passed out. Thankfully for her, the redhead was quick to bite her lip just enough to bleed and apply the fingerprint.

Now came the hard part. The unconscious girl, Hinata, still needed to sign next to her name. Though her hold on consciousness was slipping, Tsunade could still focus enough to perform a simple jutsu. Quickly making a small superficial wound on the girl's finger, the redhead gently but firmly pushed the girl's blood-coated digit against the paper. With a quick stamping of her Hokage seal, the marriage between one Kushina Uzumaki and Hinata Hyūga was complete and binding. With another quick jutsu, a copy of the completed contract was made for archiving later.

It was nice to see such strong love between two so young. Now she felt it was about time for that nap. "Congratulations, Kushina. I hope you two are very happy together," said the blond who was noticeably swaying in place, her eyes and posture slouching. "Now out!" she commanded just before her head hit the desk with a loud bang.

Whether Naruto wanted it or not, Tsunade was out like a light. The only thing on the young redhead's mind was a question. 'Who's Kushina?'

Stepping into her apartment, Naruto wasted no time in depositing the Hyuga onto her bed. "Whew, what a workout," she huffed. Deciding that sounded as good an idea as any, Naruto set about preparing herself. She kicked off her sandals, threw her orange jacket into the closet, slipped off her matching pants, and sauntered over to the bed to lay down wearing only a T-shirt and boxers, when...

"Oh, right, Hinata-chan's still here."

That left the redhead in quite a predicament. She really wanted to lay down for a bit, but sharing a bed with Hinata didn't feel appropriate. Then again, it was her bed, so it's not like Hinata was in any position to complain. If Naruto deemed it fine to say they could both sleep in the same bed, then sleep in the same bed they would.

"And we're both girls, for now anyway, so I guess it wouldn't be that bad. But then I may not stay this way for long. Hmmm." Pulling out the piece of paper Tsunade made her sign, Naruto tried to read it over again. It made just as much sense to her now as it did the last time she went over it: not at all. There was too much fine print, legalese, and combinations of big words she didn't understand. Was it a document she signed for a medical procedure that would cure her of her "turned-into-a-girl" syndrome, was it some kind of a jutsu that would restore her original form, or what?

"Well, Oba-chan did say she fixed everything. Whatever it is, I'll find out eventually." Tossing the document aside, Naruto crawled into her bed, gently so as to not wake her guest, and laid down to let the tiredness take over. As she closed her eyes, she couldn't help but steal one last glance at the blue-haired girl lying very close to her.

Hinata-chan looks really cute when she's asleep. In a moment, so did Naruto.

Hearing those words set the blunette's heart aflame. It was happening! He was returning her feelings. "Naruto-kun."

"Take me, Hinata-chan" she said, spreading her arms out, thrusting her chest up in the air, displaying everything, hiding nothing, beckoning Hinata to feast upon her form with every sense she had. "Love me, Hinata-chan! Love me with every fiber of your being!"

Hinata could do nothing less. She pounced upon the girl like a tigress and bit hungrily into her flesh.

***

Hinata's eyes fluttered open and for a moment, she could only stare blankly ahead of her. She was in a room. An unspectacular room. There was no gleaming sunlight, there was no comfortable light breeze, and there was no beautiful naked girl anywhere in sight. There was, however, a pillow wedged between her teeth that she appeared to be chewing on.

"Pah!"

The girl spat it out and wiped the drool off her face with a sheepish blush. What just got into her? It was so unlike Hinata to act that way in bed. But that dream...it was so vivid, so real! That thought brought Hinata to another realization. It was a dream. She had been asleep. And looking around at her surroundings, she realized she wasn't at home. She was...she had no idea where she was. How did she get here?

I was walking down the street, when someone crashed into me. It was a girl, she was around my age, and she had...red hair...and she was...she was...

There was no denying it. It was a contract. A marriage contract, signed and notarized by the Hokage herself. Hinata was married. She was a wife now. To this redheaded person she never met. This...beguiling redheaded stranger...

"How did this happen?" she whispered, not knowing what to think. People didn't just up and get married like that! Not unless they were really drunk, and Hinata was quite certain she had been very sober all day. Did this girl kidnap her and get her hitched? No, that couldn't have been it...this was carried out by the Hokage! The premier ninja of the Leaf wouldn't sign a marriage contract, not unless it was a political marriage between two great clans—

Wait...Hinata remembered something. It had been a couple of weeks ago. She and her team had just come back from a long mission abroad, and they were all tired and exhausted. They barely took two steps outside the Hokage's tower for debriefing when Hinata was suddenly called to see her father and the clan elders. What they had to say to her, she had no clue. She was half-asleep and hardly heard a word they uttered. At the time, she figured it was just as well; they never had anything good to say to or about her, and it was always better to just tune them out and nod her head. That was what she did, and by the next morning, the whole thing was swiftly forgotten about.

But now that she was here, in this strange place, with this strange person, holding this legally-binding contract for marriage, it dawned on Hinata just what the significance of that meeting must have been. The elders were informing her of her own arranged marriage! Her future had been decided and outright told to her right then and there, and she was too tired to realize it had even happened!

How could I have been so stupid?!

But wait...if they were going to marry her off, why would they give her to a girl of all people? Wouldn't it have made more sense if her intended was a man, so she could produce heirs for him as a wife was expected?

Actually, now that she thought about it, that wouldn't make sense either. She was the disgraced firstborn daughter of the Main House. She had been disinherited of her birthright. Bearing children was politically unsound for her and for the Hyuga clan as a whole, so perhaps giving her to a woman was perhaps the most reasonable course of action.

Glancing over at the redhead, who was still fast asleep, Hinata remembered how the girl just tackled her in the street and kissed her. She must have been looking forward to this. She was so excited to finally meet me, her intended wife, that she couldn't contain herself. She...wanted me. She wanted me really badly.

Hinata walked over to the small table in what had to be the apartment's kitchen and took a seat. She had a lot to think about...and honestly, she didn't know what to think. "I don't want this!" she quietly wailed. "I don't want my life decided for me! I don't even know this girl! The one I want to be with is...is..."

Her heart sank. Naruto always seemed so far away as it was, but now, it was impossible for them to ever share their lives together. Even if Hinata found the courage to tell him how she felt, it could only ever be a pipedream now.

"But would I ever find the courage to tell him how I felt?" She shook her head. No, of course not. That was the one thing she was quite certain she never would find the strength to achieve. Maybe she could become a strong ninja in her own right, maybe she would one day impress her father and the clan elders, maybe she would one day regain her sister's respect...but she would never be able to tell Naruto her feelings for him. And she was quite certain that even if she did, he wouldn't return them. He only had eyes for Sakura. Hinata...she was just a weirdo to him, nothing more, nothing less. That is all she would ever be to him.

"But she...this girl...she does want me," Hinata said, turning around to steal a glance at the sleeping redhead. The absolutely gorgeous redhead. Even in her slumber, she was absolutely enchanting. The way that great crimson mane spilled all around her...how her chest rose up and down with her breathing...how her nipples were poking through that T-shirt that was at least one size too small.

I could...probably think of worse fates than to be married to this girl. This...

Uzumaki Kushina. That was what her name was according to the document. Hinata had to wonder if that was a coincidence, or if perhaps, maybe, she was a relative to Naruto? If that was the case...then maybe Hinata could be a part of Naruto's life after all. Not as his wife or his lover, but maybe they could actually become friends? They had to be. She and him were now family.

Still, that was a distant concern. Right now, Hinata had a more immediate one: how should she greet her new wife?

When two people join each other in holy matrimony, it's important for them to consummate the marriage. Hinata blushed as she realized what that meant, but she couldn't hide the smile that was starting to creep its way up her face. She could still see her, Kushina, naked and offering herself to Hinata in that dream. And Hinata could still feel the hardness in her nipples, which were still standing tall and erect in her bra. Just as she could feel a strong tingling sensation in her core.

Yes, that was what she would do. Hinata would consummate her marriage to Kushina, and make her the happiest woman imaginable.

With the sudden loss of the story 'Naruto turns into a girl', NoMore and I have decided to open a new story with Naruto turning into a female and move all of our saved chapters here. Rules and Warnings:

3) Keep in mind that we are writing this story under assumed rules and laws of the Narutoverse. As there are no concrete details on their law system we will be taking creative privileges and working with some older era laws and customs thrown in.
4) Sex scenes between the new feminized Naruto and another, especially a female, are highly encouraged. However, do give some thought to what you are writing before adding.
